data: On a very hot day in August of 1994, my wife told me she was going down to the Derry Rite Aid to pick up a refill on her sinus medicine prescriptionâ€” this is stuff you can buy over the counter these days, I believe.

On a very hot day in August of 1994, my wife told me she was going down to the Derry Rite Aid to pick up a refill on her sinus medicine prescription-- this is stuff you can buy over the counter these days, I believe.
